name: Logistic Regression - WEKA implementation
author: Eibe Frank, Mark A. Hall, and Ian H. Witten
title: The WEKA Workbench

parameter.name: useConjugateGradientDescent
parameter.description: Wether conjugate gradient descent is used.

parameter.name: batchSize
parameter.description: The preferred batch size for batch predictions.

parameter.name: numDecimalPlaces
parameter.description: The number of decimal places shown in the output.
